SCTX:
begin brallionScript

short doonce
short ringcount

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( brallion->GetItemCount "exquisite_ring_brallion" < 1 )
	set ringcount to 1
endif

if ( doonce == -1 )
	return
endif

if ( doonce == 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex TG_SS_GreedySlaver >= 10 )
		brallion->PositionCell 80,100,140,0 "Sadrith Mora, Fara's Hole in the Wall"
		set doonce to 1
	endif
endif

if ( doonce == 1 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex TG_SS_GreedySlaver >= 50 )
		brallion->Position 145980.750, 38996.141, 911.657, 180
		set doonce to -1
	endif
endif

















End brallionScript
